scripts.dev: pnpm -C apps/api dev & pnpm -C apps/app dev
scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/shared build && pnpm -C apps/api build && pnpm -C apps/app build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C packages/shared exec tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.json && pnpm -C apps/api exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm -C apps/app exec vue-tsc --noEmit
